column7: Directed independent creative activity or research. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: 3.3 GPA minimum required to enroll. A contract must be completed & approved. Consent of instructor and faculty administrator for Sustainable Design. Junior standing in Sustainable Design.
